% !TEX program = xelatex
\documentclass{resume}

% Load user-editable content (do not edit main.tex; edit files under content/)
\input{content/basic.tex}
\input{content/education.tex}
\input{content/work.tex}
\input{content/research.tex}
\input{content/honors.tex}
\input{content/practice.tex}
\input{content/skills.tex}
\input{content/self.tex}
\input{content/objective.tex}
\input{content/other.tex}

% Use profile macros
\name{\ProfileName}
\contact{\ProfileContact \quad \ProfileTarget}
\links{}
% If user set \ProfilePhoto in profile.tex, uncomment to show
\ifdefined\ProfilePhoto
  \photo[2.6cm]{\ProfilePhoto}
\fi

\begin{document}
\resumetitle

% Basic info block (optional; enable in content/basic.tex by setting \ShowBasicInfotrue)
\ifShowBasicInfo
\section*{基本信息}
\begin{tabularx}{\linewidth}{@{}lX@{}}
姓名: & \ProfileName \\
性别: & \ProfileGender \\
年龄: & \ProfileAge \\
联系方式: & \ProfileContact \\
意向岗位: & \ProfileTarget \\
\end{tabularx}
\fi

% Sections in priority order: Education > Work > Research/Projects
\section*{教育背景}
\EducationSection

\section*{工作/实习经历}
\WorkSection

\section*{科研/项目经历}
\ResearchSection

% Additional sections (honors, practice, skills, self, objective, other)
\HonorsSection
\PracticeSection
\SkillsSection
\SelfSection
\ObjectiveSection
\OtherSection

\end{document}
